question: You are studying for a qualification, and you would like some time off work to complete it.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:Ask for some time off to complete a qualification.Suggest what you will do later at work if you have time off.Say how the qualification helps your job or company.You do NOT need to write any addresses.You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am one of your employees who is working for your company for about two years . Actually, I am writing this letter to take some days off as I have some classes to increase my knowledge which are related to  my job and I also want to raise my experience in the field that I have been working on it since two months ago.

If you give me this chance, I can do my work in a better way and after my ,exams I can stay longer to deliver all of my papers which are on my shoulders on time .Moreover, I will bring my duties to my home and work at night.
I hope you understand my situation and I promise to do my job on time .
I looking forward to receiving your permission and I will really appreciate it.
